alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 3:24PM EDT until August 09 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 324 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tallahassee, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Moccasin Gap, Killearn Estates, Lake Iamonia, Bradfordville, Maclay State Gardens, Killearn Lakes, Iamonia, Pisgah Church and Miccosukee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
